snippet.title: Super Mario 74: Ten Years After [Deluxe Edition] (Download)
snippet.description:
This trailer is rushed beyond belief, I'm sorry. 

Enjoy this 12-min trailer even though I'm super duper lazy with video skills and ideas to attract my lost audience :P

NEW v2.74.2 UPDATE! (Deluxe Hotfix 1 as of 30/06) Download: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1XslCTRcMiKatRAr4h8lm1DjcTDmDIQXR/view?usp=sharing

I won't spoil anything new until you play it and check stuff out by yourself. But the readme will tell what's what anyways. Happy decade, Super Mario 74!

---

Once again, a big thanks to Lugmillord, the creator of Super Mario 74, for being supportive and helped me guide through this updated version. 

Be sure to check out his latest released hacks "Lug's Delightful Dioramas" & "Lug's Tiny Torture", the pinnacle of the SM74 timeline!

His channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/Lugmillord

---

::: Keep crashin'! :::

|| Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/lincrash 
|| The Big C: https://discord.gg/XewDxfH

---

♪ Background music: 

Mario's Ranks - Super Mario Kart
Title Menu - Paper Mario
Dangerous Game - Mario Party
Hoohoo Village - Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga
Molgera - The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker
Metallic Mario - Super Mario 64
Koopa Troopa Beach - Mario Kart 64
Dogadon Battle - Donkey Kong 64
Powerful Mario - Super Mario 64
Castle Theme (Remix) - Super Mario Bros.
X-Naut Fortress - Paper Mario: The Thousand-Year Door
Miracle Matter - Kirby 64: The Crystal Shards

Music copyrighted by Nintendo, Rareware, Intelligent Systems & HAL Laboratory.
